snippet.title: The Mystery of Castle Super Beast [Announcement Trailer]
snippet.description:
*Edit*  It's out! https://remerai.itch.io/the-mystery-of-castle-super-beast *Edit*

I made a game based on Woolie (@WoolieWoolz of Woolie Versus) and Pat (@PatStaresAt ...of Pat Stares At) of Castle Super Beast.

This is a non-profit fan game I made in Unity in little under three months in order to get more experience using the tools. Getting better at the thing you love doing seems like a good way to spend your time. Being able to create a game with a beginning, middle and end is something, at least. I expect bugs.

If everything goes smoothly (no promises!) I will release the game on Halloween. Check back here then for more information. (Or whenever, as you might be out trick or treating, or hanging out with friends)
